name: diamondhead-inventory
description: The Diamondhead Inventory Management that we are developing aims to overhaul the whole system and utilize the internet and the portability of web-based application to create a unified system that can be used by all the employees of Diamondhead Dental Lab. The system aims to eliminate the manual labor and record-keeping as much as possible, and furthermore, it can be run on any device that can run a JavaScript supported browser.
author: The Gang
